name: One Pixel Game
description:
Click the screen when its green!

If you accidentally click the pixel when its red, the game will end and your score will be shown by a series of flashes. Green if it is a new high score, red if it isn't. Then the game will restart.

Right-click to toggle the audio menu, then left click to adjust the volume. 

Made in about 10 minutes for the LowRezJam 2021.
